price: ពួកទាំងនោះហើយដែលអល់ឡោះបានដាក់បណ្ដាសា ពួកគេ និងបានធ្វើឱ្យពួកគេថ្លង់ ហើយនិងធ្វើឱ្យភ្នែករបស់ពួកគេ ងងឹត។
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمۡ وَأَعۡمَىٰٓ أَبۡصَٰرَهُمۡ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna laʿanahumu al-lahu fa-aṣammahum wa-aʿmā abṣārahum
